instruction: Provide the main character feature for the novel "Lord of the Flies".
output: The main character in Lord of the Flies is Ralph, a young British boy marooned on an uninhabited island. He is the protagonist and he serves as the leader of the group of boys. He values structure, laws, and democracy and he tries to enforce them among his peers. He strives to uphold the moral bond in his society and provides support and kindness to the other boys. He is also characterized by his strong conviction and unwavering loyalty to his cause. He stands in opposition to Jack and his followers, who reject the laws of civilization.
